name: Frédéric Chopin
biography: Frédéric Chopin was a Polish composer and virtuoso pianist of the Romantic era who wrote primarily for solo piano. He has maintained worldwide renown as a leading musician of his era, whose poetic genius was based on a professional technique that was without equal in his generation.
